name: Blueberry-Lemon Breakfast Biscuits
author: Yoly
summary: With only 4 ingredients, these biscuits are so tasty that you could serve them for dessert.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper
Remove biscuits from the can and split in half crosswise, for a total of 10 biscuits
Place 5 biscuits on the prepared cookie sheet; divide blueberries over the tops
Cover blueberries with the remaining biscuits
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 18 to 22 minutes
Combine powdered sugar, lemon juice, and zest in a small bowl
Brush biscuits tops with 1/2 of the glaze
Let sit until glaze has set, about 5 minutes
